titles.title: Thank God I belong to Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Well I’m happy to tell you ‘bout my savior and my friend, Jesus is with me till the very very end He gives me His love and His power from above Thank God I belong to Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O the world has appeal- it’s just an illusion My mind has to battle with lies and confusion The schemes of the devil are temptation and delusion Thank God I belong to Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Well I walked through my life in the usual way Thinkin’ about myself and livin’ for the day My life was a sham until I met the Lamb Thank God I belong to Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O the world has appeal- it’s just an illusion My mind has to battle with lies and confusion The schemes of the devil are temptation and delusion Thank God I belong to Him{/lang-eng}
